unnormalised: SpiceJet flight SG 402 from Delhi to Mumbai, scheduled to depart at 6:00 AM, is now delayed. Expected departure time, tentatively: 9:30 AM… maybe? Passengers are requested to 'prepone' their breakfast and 'adjust' their sleep cycles. Apparently, a pigeon decided to have a chai break ON the engine. #PigeonPower #IndianAirlines #TravelWoes
normalised: SpiceJet flight S-G four hundred and two from Delhi to Mumbai, scheduled to depart at six zero zero A-M, is now delayed. Expected departure time, tentatively: nine thirty A-M… maybe? Passengers are requested to 'prepone' their breakfast and 'adjust' their sleep cycles. Apparently, a pigeon decided to have a chai break O-N the engine. hash Pigeon Power hash Indian Airlines hash Travel Woes

unnormalised: Update: Flight SG 402 is further delayed. New departure time: 12:00 PM. The pigeon is still at it, seemingly unfazed by the ground staff's attempts to *politely* evict it. Some passengers are suggesting a group rendition of Bollywood songs to scare it away. Management says they're considering a "cultural solution." Stay tuned for more flight updates... and potential dance-offs.
normalised: Update: Flight S-G four hundred and two is further delayed. New departure time: twelve zero zero P-M. The pigeon is still at it, seemingly unfazed by the ground staff's attempts to politely evict it. Some passengers are suggesting a group rendition of Bollywood songs to scare it away. Management says they're considering a "cultural solution." Stay tuned for more flight updates... and potential dance-offs.

unnormalised: Final Update: SG 402 departed at 2:00 PM... three hours LATE!! Turns out, the pigeon has now signed a contract with the airline as a "avian safety inspector". All pax reached at mumbai at 4:00 pm IST. We're kidding (mostly). But seriously, we need a bird-b-gone solution stat!
normalised: Final Update: S-G four hundred and two departed at two zero zero P-M... three hours L-A-T-E!!
